title: Manage New Product Formulation
description: An R&D chemist needs to create a new formulation for an experimental product in the formulation management system.

tasks.description: Create a new product code and name for the experimental material.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new, unique product identifier.

tasks.description: Enter the formulation components and their target percentages into the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new formulation recipe with 4 components, totaling 100%.

tasks.description: Define the required in-process and final quality tests for the new product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully links 5 quality tests (e.g., viscosity, pH, solids content) to the new product specification.
